application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Public House413 Green LanesLondonN13 4JD
description: Details pursuant to ref: 21/02488/VAR: technical specification for the additional intake and outlet louvres to south elevation (17), for the variation of Ref:17/03634/FUL condition number 02 to allow cycle storage relocation to rear of car park, staircase to podium deck re-planned, pathway added adjacent to building to access bike store from fox Lane, changes to fox lane elevation to incorporate UKPN enclosure access, minor layout changes to plant and store rooms and screens at ground floor, changes to entrance to Pure Gym elevation aligned with adjacent shop frontage at ground floor rather than projecting pier, alterations to floor levels to new-build first floor and relationship to the Fox pub features, addition of lift over-run, alterations to rooflight positions and smoke control shafts, AOVs amended, addition of vertical screening to conceal plant on plant deck, addition of intake and outlets louvres to south elevation to accommodate mechanical services for Gym operator / tenant, minor repositioning of windows and extension of balcony to flat 47.
